website_summaries.verdict: A high-speed machine that comes with great features, including snap-on hoops and automatic needle threading.
pros: Work quickly with up to 700 embroidery stitches per minute
Plenty of built-in stitches and designs, plus USB stick design transfer
cons: Expensive, and some owners complain about machine quality and durability

customer_reviews.title: This is by far the worst machine I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the worst machine I have ever owned. I have loved Singer and have an XL-580 that is fantastic. I wanted a second embroidery machine so I chose the Legacy. Within a month of fairly low get use it died. It won’t embroider. It won’t sew. This is the worst piece of junk I have ever bought.
customer_reviews.author: Preston Diehl

customer_reviews.title: Singer Sucks!
customer_reviews.text: Customer service at Singer sucks! My usb stick for the software program died. I have called several times to try to get another usb but with no luck! I guess next machine WILL NOT be a singer.....
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Newsome

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: Only gave it 1 star because 0 doesn't work. Right after my return window closed it stopped working. So just over a month old and it is not working. I should have known it was too cheap to be any good. So now I have to contact Singer and hope they make this right. Every modern Singer I have purchased has been junk not sure why I gave this one a try.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Reese

customer_reviews.title: All in all very happy!!
customer_reviews.text: I have only embroidered with it once and loved it! I have mostly been sewing with this machine so far! So much easier to use than my old machine!! This is the 1st time I've ever had a machine that will thread the needle and will never own another that doesn't!! The only problem I have had is with the memory stick, I can't get this to print the pages from my computer as it says!! I will have to contact someone for help with that!!
customer_reviews.author: Marsha

customer_reviews.title: My disappointment with this one is the automatic treading device
customer_reviews.text: This is my newest Singer Machine, my first one is a relic. All the features a about the same compared to the other brands. My disappointment with this one is the automatic treading device, i still can't finger it out . I still have not been able to use this to thread my machine, so for this reason I will consider sending it back for the SE400 which is an upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: handybook

customer_reviews.title: If you value your sanity, get a different machine.
customer_reviews.text: This machine is making me insane. It has a MAJOR thread breakage problem—the thread breaks and clogs the thread path, causing future thread to break, and causing the bobbin thread to show on the top side of the embroidery designs. I have had this problem since day one. I have had it into the shop to get the thread path cleaned out multiple times. The last time was today. The thread path is already clogged again, mere hours after the last repair. Don’t buy this machine, the design is flawed. I love my other Singers, but this one is not up to par.
customer_reviews.author: Bettina

customer_reviews.title: I love my legacy it is perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love my legacy it is perfect! Sews great, it’s quiet and fast. I have not used the embroidery part of the machine yet, I can’t wait to put it to use. This machine is everything, It is a great help with my business and making my projects look more professional.
customer_reviews.author: Rossana J.

customer_reviews.title: Not a good value.
customer_reviews.text: I studied the video's for using embroidery machine several times to make sure I was correct in the way I used machine. It would start out fine then refuse to move from 1 spot. The thread bunched up. The bobbin hangs up. There was numerous faults with the machine. It may have beeen damaged during shipping as I have always bought Singer products and never had a problem like this. We have a 4x4 embroidery & 5x7 embroidery machines, and have never had problems. I hope the company can work out the problems with this machine.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Collins Blanton

customer_reviews.title: New to sewing
customer_reviews.text: Singer is a well known brand. Have had my Brother x2600 for 13+ years works well. Get my new machine which is a good value here on Amazon compared to stores. 800.00 however when I got it noted that there is a small peg holds up the dog feet that was broken and could not get the feet to move up and down. I ended up fixing myself. I think this good for maybe an experienced sewer/embroider but not a beginner. I should of sent machine back since it was broken when I got it but did not want to wait for another one. I find the threading mechanism not great either. gets tangled easily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Help in figuring it out but now that I have a little hiccup here and there but love it
customer_reviews.text: Had to get help to figure it out and it thread bunches up sometimes be careful I watch mine but then you have too I think.
customer_reviews.author: mark boyer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I like the singer product. This is the 6th singer machine that I have purchased
customer_reviews.author: Louise Szankar

customer_reviews.title: How I can find training class for this machine
customer_reviews.text: I have problems with this machine when I use.threat cut every time
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Singer SE300 Embroidery machine. Treat yourself !
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful machine, able to embroider pretty much everything. Im still learning new ways of doing things with it, but I recommend it 100%. Good value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Gantus-Whitton

customer_reviews.title: The only thing I have disliked is the embroidery program you can not do anyrhing ...
customer_reviews.text: So far loving it. The only thing I have disliked is the embroidery program you can not do anyrhing with it you actually have to buy a separate program to be able to actually do some good designs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: It need Programing to work but I like it it works for small designs as patches and letters and you can sew with it. If you like to learn you can learn from YouTube because there are many helpful videos.
customer_reviews.author: Amo0olah

customer_reviews.title: Me everyday machine
customer_reviews.text: Overall, good sewing machine. I did have to set the bobbin tension for the embroidery setting which is a bit aggravating when you switch from sewing to embroidery. I suggest having an extra bobbin, one for sewing, one for embroidery.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Ball

customer_reviews.title: It is a top of the Line Singer Embroidery machine.
customer_reviews.text: This machine even winds the bobbin by a touch on the screen, not the foot pedal. It is lighter than the other embroidery machines, a lighter plastic I think. But it is strong. I have not embroidered yet, as I work a lot. But I will soon and some of my coworkers want that done. I cannot wait.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It does everything you need and more
customer_reviews.text: This machine is amazing. I bought it to do projects for my church.
customer_reviews.author: Harley girl

customer_reviews.title: Can only use with singer needles
customer_reviews.text: I have had mine for about 2 years now and it works really well. I am giving it 3 stars because you can only use singer needles in the machine and no other brand, like schmetz.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina

customer_reviews.title: Having Singer take responsibility for this piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst machine I have ever bought. I had 2 other Singer sewing/embroidery machines and they were great. Singer sure has gone downhill. I had it for 1 1/2 yrs and had to replace the embroidery unit. After getting it back I had issues with the bobbin case moving too much causing needle to break or hit the bobbin case. I took it in to be repaired 3 times. Third time shop called me and said he couldn't fix it. What a waste of money. No more Singers for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful sewing machine for the price.  Tons of great features for crafty ladies
customer_reviews.text: love it. smooth sewing. automatic tacking, auto threading, auto thread cutting. speed control plus embroidery. all the things I need to do my quilts and more. there are some new feet in this package I have not seen before. the zig zag/applique foot is really helpful because it grips less and can maneuver more easily around appliques. I owned Brothers, and was apprehensive about a Singer, but so far, it's great. Very reasonably priced for all the features it has. It sews complicated decorative stitches like a champ. It is relatively quiet and smooth. Good job on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Denison

product_meta.title: SINGER | Legacy SE300 Embroidery Machine with 200 Built-In Embroideries, LCD Touch Screen, & 250 Built-In Stitches - Sewing Made Easy
product_meta.description:
Style Name:SE300

Specification:

Model Number – SE340
Product - Sewing Machine
Lightbulb - LED
Dimensions - 20.2 x 8 x 12.2 inches
Weight – 18.6 pounds
Manufacturer – SINGER

Built-in Stitches: 250



It’s not just a new machine. It’s a new era. Introducing the stylish new SINGER LEGACY SE340 sewing and embroidery machine. Gone are the days of longing for a machine that has all the features you need and love. This sleek new machine is packed with features and ready to help you transform your canvas into a masterpiece. The right stitch: easier sewing with better results.

SINGER LEGACY includes 10 onetouch Basic Stitches, 8 Basic Stitches, 7 Stretch Stitches, 118 Decorative Stitches, 14 Fully-Automatic Buttonholes, 18 Satin Stitches, 23 Elongation Stitches, 22 Quilting Stitches and 30 Heirloom Stitches. There is 7 7/8 Inch (200 mm) work area where wider needle-to-tower area makes it easier to manage hoops and projects.

This LEGACY sewing machine has a ton of other features like adjustable thread tension, built-in needle threader, thread cutter, start & stop button, 3 staybright led lights, high sewing & embroidery speeds- At 800 sewing stitches per minute and 700 embroidery stitches per minute, 200 embroidery designs + 6 alphabet options, extra-large embroidery area, updateable software, USB stick embroidery design transfer, bobbin winding while embroidering, universal power supply - ability to use on 110V and 220V outlets, 10 snap-on presser feet.
feature_bullets: SINGER SEWING MACHINE: The SINGER Legacy SE300 Portable Sewing Machine has 250 built-in stitches including basic, stretch, decorative, and buttonhole stitches allow you to sew a variety of projects, such as fashions, home décor, quilts, crafts, and more

AUTOMATIC NEEDLE THREADER SEWING MACHINE: After following the threading path printed right on the machine, this built-in feature helps you to effortlessly thread the eye of the needle without eye strain or frustration

BEST SEWING MACHINE: The SINGER Legacy SE300 has extra-large embroidery area, snap-on embroidery hoops, usb stick embroidery design transfer, bobbin winding while embroidering, upper thread sensor, 10 snap-on presser feet, 200 embroidery designs + 6 alphabet options which expands your creative and monogramming possibilities

HIGH SEWING AND EMBROIDERY SPEED: The SINGER Legacy SE300 Sewing Machine has a maximum sewing speed of 800 stitches-per-minute and 700 embroidery stitches per minute, and so projects can be sewn quickly

SEWING AND EMBROIDERY MACHINE ACCESSORIES: A variety of accessories are included with large and small embroidery hoop, all-purpose foot, satin stitch foot, overcasting foot, blind hem foot, zipper foot, buttonhole foot with underplate, straight stitch foot, button sewing foot, open toe foot
This sewing machine is warranted for use in the US and Canada at 110 volts only
